resources.string:
How to play?

The game is simple. You have to guess a 5 letter english word. Each time you guess, you will be given feedback for each letter of the word you guessed. Three colors represent different case as follow: 

Red: The letter is not in the word.

Yellow: The letter is in the word but it is not at its correct place.

Green: The letter is in the word and it is at its correct place.

You get only 6 guesses to guess the word and each letter appear only once in a word.
